Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Cervantes seems quite surprised when the white-haired Construct appears on the screen.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'Haicma... Why have you chosen her data sample? Is there a special reason?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'I wonder what will happen when the rational "Digital Heart" encounters the impassioned Construct that carries an enormous guilt?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'I wanted to use my own data as the variable of this run, but the results were similar to previous simulations, no matter how many times I tried.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "So I chose Haicma's data sample she left behind from the time she was in Constellia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: 'How is the program configured this time, then?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'As the gatekeeper, Haicma will stop Echo and question her reason for being there and obtaining the Codex of Order.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: '"Codex of Order"... Is there any context for that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Obtaining the Codex of Order will allow her to restore order.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "I found this entry engraved all over Echo's data, so I extracted it to be the theme of this simulation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: "I don't know much about Haicma, however, so I can't tell how their encounter will go.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: "My time with Haicma was brief, but from what I know about her, she could always view what she didn't understand through an empathetic lens.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cervantes', 3: '...Will Haicma provide new inspirations and different perspectives to Echo?', 4: '2'}
